userEmailForm.newEmailDescription: Enter a new email address to use for your account. An email will be sent to your proposed new email, with a link to confirm the email change.

confirmEmailChangePage.heading: Verify Email Change
confirmEmailChangePage.subheading: You have requested an email change. Click the button below to complete the email change.

userProfile.heading: Account Settings
userProfile.subheading: Update your account and profile settings here.
userProfile.generalSubheading: This information will be used to identify you in our system
userProfile.changeEmailDescription: You requested an email change. A verification email has been sent to {{user}}. To confirm your new email address, please follow the directions in the verification email.
userProfile.emailDescription: Your email address will be used to communicate with you. Your current email address on record is {{email}}. Changing your email requires you to confirm your new email address.
userProfile.photoDescription: This is the photo of you that other users in the system will be able to see.
userProfile.changePasswordDescription: Change your password by entering your current password, as well as your new password.
userProfile.changeMyEmailDescription: Changing your email will change your login email, as well as where emails are sent when you need to be notified.
userProfile.forgotPasswordInstructions: Click the button below to be sent instructions on how to reset your password.
userProfile.changeEmailVerificationSent: A verification email has been sent.
userProfile.passwordInstructionsSent: Instructions on how to reset your password have been sent to your email.

changePasswordPage.passwordRequirements: Password must be 8 characters or more. Password must contain a lowercase, uppercase, special character, and a number.

userHomePage.heading: User Home Page
userHomePage.subheading: Placeholder homepage for non-admin and non-editor users
userHomePage.placeholder: This is the homepage for Non-Admin and Non-Editor users. Replace this content with whatever you would like!

editorHomePage.heading: Editor Home Page
editorHomePage.placeholder: This is the homepage for Editor users. Replace this content with whatever you would like!

adminHomePage.heading: Admin Home Page
adminHomePage.placeholder: This is the homepage for Admin users. Replace this content with whatever you would like!

notifications.title: My Notifications
notifications.subheading: Notifications that have been sent to me.

activateAccountPage.accountHasBeenActivated: This account has been activated. Please log in.
activateAccountPage.activateAccountDescription: Just one more step! Choose a password to active your account.

forgotPasswordPage.youWillReceiveEmail: If the email you entered is in our system, you will receive a password reset email.
forgotPasswordPage.unableToResetPassword: Unable to perform forgot password request.
forgotPasswordPage.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send you instruction on how to reset your password.

loginPage.memberLogInDescription: Welcome back to Bitwise Admin, the best admin panel on the internet.

resetPasswordPage.resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new password you would like to use for your account.
resetPasswordPage.passwordResetSuccessful: The password was reset successfully. Please log in.

signUpPage.memberRegistrationDescription: Register for the Bitwise Admin Panel to join the best admin panel on the internet.
signUpPage.activationEmailSentTo: An activation email has been sent to:
